Class ProjectInfo

java.lang.Object
ProjectInfo
public class ProjectInfo extends Object
This class creates an object that contains information about the project, excluding the people involved in the project.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectInfo

      ProjectInfo(String projectName, String buildingType, String address, int erfNumber, double totalFee, LocalDate deadline)
      The constructor for the ProjectInfo class takes in six parameters that are used to set the attributes. The other four attributes are automatically set.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      buildingType - The type of building that will be built
      address - The address of the building site
      erfNumber - The ERF Number of the building
      totalFee - The total fee of the projects
      deadline - The deadline of the project

    • getCompleteDate

      public String getCompleteDate()
      Gets the complete date. If complete date is null, then it is set to today's date. The complete date is formatted into a string.
      Returns:
      string of the complete date
